ARABIC: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَذِكْرٌ لَّكَ وَلِقَوْمِكَ وَسَوْفَ تُسْـَٔلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is certainly a reminder to you and to your people and you will be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It is a (source) of greatness for you and your people. You will surely be questioned about it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Verily it is a great source of eminence for you and your people, and soon you will be called to account concerning that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Quran is a reminder to you and to your people and you will soon be questioned about it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And it is undoubtedly an honour for you and your people; and you will soon be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, this is indeed a Dhikr for you and your people, and you will be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely it is a reminder for you and your people, and you shall soon be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely it is a Reminder to thee and to thy people; and assuredly you will be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! it is in truth a Reminder for thee and for thy folk; and ye will be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: it is certainly a reminder to you and to your people and you will soon be  called to account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily it is an admonition Unto thee and thy people; and presently ye will be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed it is a reminder for you and your people, and soon you will be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The (Qur'an) is indeed the message, for thee and for thy people; and soon shall ye (all) be brought to account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily, this (the Quran) is indeed a Reminder for you (O Muhammad SAW) and your people (Quraish people, or your followers), and you will be questioned (about it).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It is indeed a Reminder to you and to your nation, and without doubt you shall be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is a message for you, and for your people; and you will be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, it is a remembrance for you and your people, and you [all] are going to be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:44]   And it is indeed a Reminder, an honour, for you and for your people, as it has been revealed in their language. And you will [eventually] be questioned, about [the extent of] your fulfilling your duty towards it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo!) i.e. the Qur'an (is in truth a Reminder for thee) an honour for you (and for thy folk) the Quraysh because it is revealed in their own language; (and ye will be questioned) about the gratitude which is owed to such an honour.
